definition: knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Structuralist poetics has formed the theoretical background of literary competence.
sentences.chinese: 结构主义诗学则是文学能力的理论背景。

sentences.english: Another area of particular importance for the development of structuralism has been that of linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 结构主义发展的另一个关键领域就是语言学。

sentences.english: This paper elaborates on Roland Barthes' post-structuralism text theory.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要论述巴特的后结构主义文本观。

sentences.english: It's not just a critique of structuralism.
sentences.chinese: 它不仅是结构主义的评判。

sentences.english: What is the influence of behaviourism over american structuralism?
sentences.chinese: 行为主义对美国结构主义的影响？

sentences.english: This is an essential part of the critique of structuralism.
sentences.chinese: 这是结构主义评论的必不可少的一部分。

sentences.english: This is his indirect contribution to structuralist literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 这是雅氏对结构主义文论的间接贡献。

sentences.english: It's not just structuralism in other words.
sentences.chinese: 换言之，虽然不只是结构主义。

sentences.english: Does this idea show your turn from post-structuralism?
sentences.chinese: 这一观点是否表明了您对后结构主义的背离？

sentences.english: The origins of structural theories are eclectic at best.
sentences.chinese: 结构主义理论的起源充其量也不过是折衷主义。

sentences.english: Althusser is one of the leading representations of Structuralistic Marxism.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔都塞是结构主义的马克思主义的主要代表之一。

sentences.english: Structuralist grammar sets out to describe the current spoken language which people use in communication.
sentences.chinese: 结构主义语法开始描写人们在日常交际中使用的口语。

sentences.english: This is his direct contribution to structuralist literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 这是雅氏对结构主义文论的直接贡献。

definition: surname Althusser/Louis Pierre Althusser 路易·皮埃爾·阿爾都塞|路易·皮埃尔·阿尔都塞[Lu4 yi4 · Pi2 ai1 er3 · A1 er3 dou1 sai1] (1918-1990), Marxist philosopher

pinyin: Fa3 lan2 ke4 fu2 Xue2 pai4

definition: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel (1770-1831), German philosopher
